item.title: Project 1: Breast Cancer Classification
item.description: Created a tool for predicting if the cancer diagnosis is benign or malignant based on several observations/features. Performed Feature scaling for better model building. Implemented and optimized Kernel SVM using K-Fold and Grid Search to reach best accuracy with best model having most suitable parameters. Achieved an accuracy score of 97.80% Correlation between variables Link to GitHub Repository
